Frä:124);—abs. ´[[ת]]: Ge 24:25 +, [[תֶָּבֶן]] Ex 5:10 +;—straw, i.e. straw threshed fine: chaff Je 23:28 (opp. [[בָּר]]), blown by wind Job 21:28 (in sim.; ‖[[מׂץ ]]), yielding Job 41:19 (sim.); food for camels Ge 24:25, Ge 24:32 (J), asses Ju Jdg 19:19 (all + [[מִסְפּוֹא]]), [[בָּקָר]] Is 11:7, Is 65:25, horses 1Ki 5:8 (+ [[שְׂעׂרִים]]); mixed with clay in brick-making Ex 5:7, Ex 5:7, Ex 5:10, Ex 5:11, Ex 5:12 (opp. [[קַשׂ]]), v:Ex 5:13, v:Ex 5:16, v:Ex 5:18 (J);—v. further Vogelstein:Landwirthsch. 67.
